posts.post_content: I'm asking SOLD for the Anson (SGC 40). Van Haltren (BVG 4) is SOLD.  Prices include shipping & insurance.  Please me at jpcw1999@yahoo with any questions/offers.  Thanks, Jeremy

Hi Jeremy,

I'll take the Van Haltren please.  E-mail sent - let me know if you don't receive it.

Cheers,
Blair

Hi Jeremy,

Card received - really great!  Thanks again :).

Cheers,
Blair
